## Description {#details}

Hide the operands of an instruction.

Do as if this instruction was not using any of its operands.

Definition at line 3372 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
